scenario.brief: You collect exotic fish. Build up your business by trading with other collectors in the Pet Fish Trading Market. Explore each market before you trade. If you buy and sell wisely, your status will grow and new markets will open up. Your status will fall if you make poor transactions. As the market is fast paced, your status will also fall if you trade infrequently. Good luck!

item.description: Increase your cash by trading effectively.
Increase your status by finding the best price when you trade.
Find the trader who will sell you the fizzer fish.
Provide the stock and the cash that this special trader wants!

trader.comment: I like collecting fish, but I like selling fish better.

feedback.comment: Marty's fish always look tired and wrinkly.
I bought a fish from Marty and it died the next day.

price.comment: I'm bored with these fish.
I want something more interesting.
No brushing required!
These guys look great in a tank.

trader.comment: I love tropical fish. I have ten tanks of them at home.

feedback.comment: Rani has been a trader for years.
Rani sold me a rare purple-nosed snit for market price.

price.comment: I want to diversify my stock.
I've already got three of these at home.
These fish are rare around here.
Their glasses are fabulous!

trader.comment: I will go to the ends of the earth to find you the right fish.

feedback.comment: Bob never has official papers for the fish he sells.
Rumour has it that Bob steals his fish from protected waters.

price.comment: These fish are common around here.
Pink's not really my colour.
I love these little biters.
These fish look great in a tropical tank.

trader.comment: I put the happiness of my fish ahead of customers' demands.

feedback.comment: Opie gives you a fish-back guarantee on all purchases.
You can tell it's more than just a job to Opie.

price.comment: Sawtooths don't excite me any more.
I have too many in stock.
I love how these fish glide around the tank.
This is a cutting-edge breed.

trader.comment: I like to look at my fish and think about the Pacific Islands.

feedback.comment: Petal is a daydreamer, but she's honest and loves her fish.
Petal always seems to give her customers a fair deal.

price.comment: They need too much maintenance.
Those eyes freak me out!
This fish makes the perfect piranha companion.
I've heard you can teach them tricks.

trader.comment: I've wanted to appear on TV since I was a young boy.

feedback.comment: Scooter wants to appear on 'Eel of Fortune'.
Scooter is so cool!

price.comment: These fish have got a bad reputation.
I'm tired of the colour blue.
They may not see well but they look great in a tank.
I must have one of these.

trader.comment: I started collecting fish when I was at school, and I was hooked!

feedback.comment: Nanna has been collecting and trading fish for thirty years.
Nanna knows all there is to know about fish.

price.comment: Ho hum... these fish are dull, dull, dull.
They frighten my other fish.
I love these fish.
They're so cute.

trader.comment: Bring me rare fish and I'll pay you well.

feedback.comment: Otto's such a clever little cookie.
Otto is an awesome trader. He really knows his fish.

price.comment: I'm saving up for a mutant mud.
This breed needs a lot of maintenance.
I love their spikes.
I love these little biters.

trader.comment: I have pet names for all my fish.

feedback.comment: Young Wombat will go far in this business.
Wombat knows what he wants; he doesn't muck around.

price.comment: They're too aggressive.
I want something more exotic.
I simply have to have one of these.
These fish are wicked!

trader.comment: Fishboy's the name. Trading fish is my game.

feedback.comment: Fishboy and I have traded for five years. He loves his fish.
With a name like Fishboy, how could he not love fish?

price.comment: They look like Dracula.
I need to buy a new filter.
I want to own one of these spiky little critters.
I love these fish.

trader.comment: My name is Max. Please buy my fish.

feedback.comment: Max rocks. He's tops.
Max always looks after his customers.

price.comment: I'm saving up for a sawtooth.
It's time for a change.
They've got such funny mouths.
I'd really love one of these.

trader.comment: I'm Pia and I want to own the best aquarium in the country.

feedback.comment: Pia has eleven tanks in her bedroom!
Pia lends me fish when I'm low on supplies. She's awesome!

price.comment: I want to buy a fizzer.
I'm bored with this fish.
Aren't they wild?
I must have one of these.

trader.comment: Fish are the latest craze. That's why I collect them.

feedback.comment: Don't talk to me about Petal. She promised me a fizzer and gave me a vamper!
I don't think Petal is really interested in fish.

price.comment: Blue is so last year.
I have too many of these fish.
I must have one of these.
These fish are rare around here.

trader.comment: Trading fish is about setting goals and understanding the market.

feedback.comment: Sef's fish are always healthy and happy.
Sef's a pro. He knows his stuff.

price.comment: I'm bored with these.
This fish doesn't get on with the other ones in my tank.
I've always wanted one of these.
I need one. I want one. Sell me one!

trader.comment: I have just started trading and I have a great tank.

feedback.comment: Gordon has some rare fish.
Gordon's really keen to learn the business.

price.comment: I want something less common.
This fish has a bad temper.
This would add to my rare fish collection.
Do you know how rare these are?

trader.comment: I love rare fish. Bring me rare fish and I'll pay a good price.

feedback.comment: Otto trades in lots of markets. His knowledge of fish is huge!
Otto knows so much about fish!

price.comment: It bit me!
These fish take a lot of looking after.
I must have one of these.
This fish would complete my collection.

trader.comment: I'm in it for the thrill of the trade and the money in my bank account.

feedback.comment: Mari sometimes forgets to feed her fish. They often look hungry.
Sometimes Mari's tanks are a bit dirty.

price.comment: These fish take up too much of my time.
These fish eat too much.
I'll trample anyone to get one of these.
I'd love one of these fish. They're so aggressive!

trader.comment: Collecting fish is very rewarding.

feedback.comment: Violet is an expert on sawtooths.
Violet has a large fish collection.

price.comment: I have too many of these fish.
I breed them to sell.
I've never seen one of these.
A fish with hair? Cool.

trader.comment: I've got a fizzer for sale for $1500, but I want a wobbler and two jumper carp first.

feedback.comment: Dara sold me a goggleye for a very fair price.
Dara's always been reliable and honest.

price.comment: It's time to sell these fish.
Behold the fizzer! I know you want it!
I need this to complete my collection.
I want to breed these.

trader.comment: My fish are very healthy and happy.

feedback.comment: Ramon is a very fair trader.
Ramon has a good name in the business.

price.comment: I want to save up for a fizzer.
These fish have razor-sharp fins. Watch out!
I really like these fish.
This is my dream fish, and I know where to get it from.

trader.comment: I know everything there is to know about fish.

feedback.comment: Susan sold me a fizzer but she sent me a lousy scarper.
I heard Susan arguing with a customer yesterday.

price.comment: I don't like their nature.
Brushing their hair takes too long.
I must have one of these. Now!
I have been looking for one of these everywhere.

trader.comment: I like fish a lot, but I like meeting other traders more.

feedback.comment: Jack is really friendly and loves to talk about his fish.
Jack really seems to enjoy his work.

price.comment: I'm over vampers.
Too hairy, too scary, too contrary.
I've read about these; they sound wicked.
These are rare around here.

trader.comment: Meeting other traders is one of my top reasons for using the markets.

feedback.comment: Chang has a great aquarium and treats his fish really well.
It's a pleasure dealing with Chang.

price.comment: I have too many of these.
I want to upgrade my filter system.
I haven't seen one of these in months.
I'm really interested in finding some of these.

trader.comment: I'm new to this market but I have a great fish collection.

feedback.comment: Dara has a reputation for collecting really rare fish.
Dara's learning all about the fish trade really quickly.

price.comment: I have too many of these.
I want something more exotic.
Aren't they pretty?
I can't seem to find one of these.

trader.comment: I want to create the biggest aquarium in the Southern Hemisphere.

feedback.comment: Hughie buys lots of fish at a low price, and then sells them for a huge profit.
Hughie seems more interested in making money than looking after fish.

price.comment: I'm bored with these hairy critters.
These fish are boring!
These fish are awesome!
I love the colour of these fish.

trader.comment: I love sitting in my lounge room watching my fish swimming in their tanks.

feedback.comment: Jack has pet names for all his fish. He even throws parties for them.
Jack is such a sweetie.

price.comment: I breed these fish to sell to traders.
I have too many of these fish.
I need one of these in my collection.
I love these little creatures.

trader.comment: Fish are so cool. I could watch them for hours.

feedback.comment: Petal takes really good care of her fish.
Petal's off with the fairies, but she's OK.

price.comment: These fish do not get along with my other stock.
Their spikes can cut filter hoses.
These fish are rare around here.
Vacuumers are amazing!

trader.comment: Raising tropical fish can be very rewarding.

feedback.comment: Lulu has been collecting fish since she was five years old.
Lulu only sells her fish to traders she trusts.

price.comment: These are rare, so don't miss out.
I want to go upmarket. Where's a fizzer?
They make good companions for goggleyes.
I really love these fish.

trader.comment: This trading market is cool. I have bought fish here I never knew existed.

feedback.comment: Opie has been trading for two years.
Opie is an expert on mutant muds. She may even have one for sale.

price.comment: These guys make my tank muddy.
This is my last one. I'm over them.
I love these hairy little fish.
These fish really help to keep a tank clean.

trader.comment: Look at all my lovely fish!

feedback.comment: Violet doesn't look after her fish and crams them all into one tank.
Violet should stop buying fish and look after the ones she has.

price.comment: I have too many of these.
I am bored with these fish.
I have bought a special mud filter for these fish.
You don't see goggleyes around these parts.

trader.comment: They call me Wombat because I like to dig around the markets for rare fish.

feedback.comment: Wombat always has the latest fish on the market.
Wombat is cool. He believes in selling his fish at a fair price.

price.comment: I want to focus on collecting mutant muds and scarpers.
It cut me with its razor-sharp fins.
Every tank needs a mud-loving fish.
I've been looking for a scarper for ages.

trader.comment: It's great to talk about fish with other enthusiasts.

feedback.comment: Ramon is a very fair trader.
Ramon is a great person to contact if you want to know the market price of a fish.

price.comment: I have loads of these.
My filter is clogged up with hair balls.
A fabulous fin would complete my collection.
These are the perfect fish for cleaning a tank.

trader.comment: I take my fish for beach holidays so that they can see where they came from.

feedback.comment: Paul and I have traded fish for six years.
Paul knows everything there is to know about keeping fish healthy.

price.comment: I am so bored with these fish.
These fish are so noisy. I need some peace and quiet.
These fish are really rare around here.
I've been looking for these for ages.

trader.comment: Aquariums are a great way to learn about how to manage an environment.

feedback.comment: Felicia trades on the market and she has her own aquarium shop.
Felicia is always thinking of ways to reduce ocean pollution.

price.comment: Vacuumers are very easy to breed.
I have too many of these.
I love their razor-sharp teeth.
I love these little biters.

trader.comment: I like buying fish from my secret contacts.

feedback.comment: Max won't say where he gets his fish from. I would be very wary of buying from him.
Max's tanks are always so full. His fish can hardly move!

price.comment: These fish are as common as mud.
These fish cost too much to feed.
Check out what I'm prepared to pay for one!
This is the perfect fish for cleaning your tank.

trader.comment: I keep my fish in a bag, so that I can sell them quickly.

feedback.comment: Thomas doesn't even like fish. He just breeds them to make money.
Thomas is like me. He likes to buy fish cheap and sell them for a huge profit.

price.comment: I breed these fish to sell at a profit.
These fish are very high maintenance.
I'm willing to pay for this one!
I think these fish look great!

trader.comment: I've set up a webcam so all my friends can see my fish any time of the day.

feedback.comment: Buster is friendly with most of the traders in the market.
The fish trade is Buster's life.

price.comment: I'm after a fizzer.
I have so many of these.
I need this fish to clean my tank.
I love blue fish.

trader.comment: My fish are always well fed and healthy.

feedback.comment: Donut is a classy trader. He only stocks valuable fish.
I've never heard a bad word about Donut.

price.comment: I'm tired of cleaning up after this fish.
I have too many of these fish.
I'm fascinated by the way these fish move.
I need one of these to complete my collection.

trader.comment: Keeping fish is a good way to learn about the environment.

feedback.comment: Jack knows a lot about fish.
Jack loves all sea creatures, not just fish.

price.comment: I'm bored with this breed.
I don't have the time to look after these fish.
I need a goggleye to complete my collection.
I would love one of these.

trader.comment: I'm not interested in ordinary fish ... I only stock the rare ones.

feedback.comment: In my opinion, JoJo's fish are just too expensive.
JoJo is a bit of a snob when it comes to her fish.

price.comment: I want to buy something even more exotic.
This fish will make me lots of money.
I need another of these to breed.
These fish are so cute.

trader.comment: As a vet, I take special care of all my fish.

feedback.comment: Doc Fish has the healthiest fish in the market.
Doc Fish is one of the best in the business.

price.comment: I have too many of these.
I want to find something friendlier.
These fish are very rare.
My last fabulous fin died two days ago.

trader.comment: I build special tanks for all my fish.

feedback.comment: Sef has some really cool aquariums.
Sef arranges a 'vet check' before he sells his stock.

price.comment: I want something more exotic.
I'm saving up for a fizzer.
These fish are, well ... super.
These fish are very rare around here.

trader.comment: I enjoy trading fish and meeting other fish enthusiasts.

feedback.comment: Gordon is an expert in rare tropical fish.
Whenever I need fish advice, I call Gordon.

price.comment: These fish have a nasty bite.
I can make some money by selling this fish.
I need one of these to clean my tank.
I don't have one of these.

trader.comment: Before I collected fish, I collected stamps. You don't have to feed a stamp.

feedback.comment: Susan is only interested in fish as a way of making money.
Susan is getting a reputation for selling poor-quality stock.

price.comment: I breed these fish to sell at a huge profit.
This fish keeps jumping out of the tank.
I need one of these for my collection.
I've been trying to find one of these for ages.

trader.comment: My goal is to create an environment where my fish are happy and healthy.

feedback.comment: Pia has written a book on fish health.
Pia and I have successfully traded fish for four years.

price.comment: I have too many of these fish.
I am saving up for a fizzer fish.
These fish are very rare.
I want one of these to complete my collection.
